title: Katerina Stefanidi on love, star signs, and pole vaulting
description:
It’s officially one year to go until Tokyo 2020. We invited Olympic champion pole vaulter from Greece Katerina Stefanidi on the podcast with her husband and coach Mitchell Krier. We spoke about how they met, why Katerina struggles with self-belief, and her plans for the World Championships in Doha. Plus, we put their dedication to each other to the test with a game about her star sign.

 

LINKS:

Katerina Stefanidi on Instagram

Mitch Krier on Instagram

Olympic Channel on Instagram

Ed Knowles on Twitter

Dashawn Jordan episode

Tokyo 2020 #1YearToGo
